title.rendered: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered:
On May 2015, Ferncliff DAI Listed AS, a company controlled by board member Øystein Stray Spetalen, purchased 81,574 shares at NOK 09.03, – per share.
After the transactions Øystein Stray Spetalen and Associated companies hold 6,294,283 shares in Aqualis ASA Corresponding Thurs 14.06% of the outstanding shares.
